mapper.select: select * from member where MEMBER_ID = #{ memberId } and PW = #{ pw }
select count(*) from member where MEMBER_ID like #{ memberId }
select * from roll where dept_id = (select dept_id from member where member_id = #{ member_id }) and position_id = (select position_id from member where member_id = #{ member_id })
select count(*) from member where admin_yn = 'N'

SELECT m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.PW, m.ADMIN_YN, d.DEPT_NAME, p.POSITION_NAME FROM member m FULL JOIN position p ON m.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID FULL JOIN department d ON m.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE ADMIN_YN = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_ID

SELECT m.MEMBER_ID, m.MEMBER_NAME, m.PW, m.ADMIN_YN, d.DEPT_NAME, p.POSITION_NAME FROM member m FULL JOIN position p ON m.POSITION_ID = p.POSITION_ID FULL JOIN department d ON m.DEPT_ID = d.DEPT_ID WHERE ADMIN_YN = 'N' and dept_name=#{ deptName } and position_name=#{ positionName } ORDER BY MEMBER_ID

select report_id, member_name, dept_name, POSITION_NAME, sign_image from member join DEPARTMENT using(dept_id) join POSITION using(POSITION_ID) join report_sign using(member_id) where report_id = #{ reportId }
select count(*) from member where admin_yn = 'N' and MEMBER_ID like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from member where admin_yn = 'N' and MEMBER_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from member full join position using (POSITION_ID) full join department using (DEPT_ID) where admin_yn = 'N' and DEPT_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from member full join position using (POSITION_ID) full join department using (DEPT_ID) where admin_yn = 'N' and POSITION_NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select count(*) from member full join position using (POSITION_ID) full join department using (DEPT_ID) where admin_yn = 'N' and ENROLL_DATE between #{begin} and #{end}
